questiontext.text:
This is a demo showing different customisable options


public class hello {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        System.out.println("Hello world!");
    }
    
    String shown = "I should see this line";
    String hidden = "I should not see this line";
}

public class hello {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        System.out.println("Hello world!");
    }
    
    String cutoff = "This should not be cut off";
}
def some_function():
    return
    
}
def other_function():
    alpha_list = ("This", "ran", "Python")
    print(" ".join(alpha_list))
other_function()

#include <stdio.h>
int main() {
	size_t i = 0;
	for (; i < 40000; i++) {
		printf("%lu", i);
 }
 }

print("<h2>I'm a heading</h2>")
print("<ol><li>Bullet 1</li><li>Bullet 2</li></ol>")

print("<h2>I'm a heading</h2>")
print("<ol><li>Bullet 1</li><li>Bullet 2</li></ol>")

def some_function():
    some_list = ("This", "ran", "Python")
    print(" ".join(some_list))
some_function()

def its_been_awhile():
    return True
